text: Import Point Attribute can fetch the attribute value from a geometry stored on disk.

What type of attribute data to fetch. The attribute should be large enough to fill out the desired size. For example, a vector attribute needs to be a float attribute of size 3. Therefore to fetch color, you'd use

If the attribute cannot be imported because it does not exist, or
    is not a compatible type, or the specified element is invalid, this
    will be the resulting value.

You can fetch attributes from one of the inputs to the current
    operator rather than a file.  When set to other than File, the Geometry
    File is overridden.  This allows you to refer to a SOP operator without
    the op: or opinput: syntax.
The file on disk to fetch an attribute from.
The name of the attribute to fetch.
fetches the common color attribute, and
The point to fetch from.  If not specified, uses the current point number.
